attributes.action: This government shows that they hold our country in contempt.They must resign
attributes.background: The latest example is the series of lies that David David has told parliament and the country about the existence of brexit impact reports. The government must resign.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Cabinet Ministers to be sacked. A decision to resign is a decision for the individual to make, not the Government or the House of Commons as a whole.

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/204379
